sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Makes a text field specified by widgetID active. If the text field is not in an active window, then the text field will become active when the window does. If another text field was active in the window, it is deactivated.
sections.text_content: Makes a text field specified by widgetID active. If the text field is not in an active window, then the text field will become active when the window does. If another text field was active in the window, it is deactivated.
sections.mdown_content: Makes a text field specified by _widgetID_ active. If the text field is not in an active window, then the text field will become active when the window does. If another text field was active in the window, it is deactivated.

sections.title: Example
sections.text_content: See GUI.CreateTextFieldfor an example of GUI.SetActive.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the procedures by calling GUI.SetActive, not by calling SetActive.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the procedures by calling GUI.SetActive, not by calling SetActive.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the procedures by calling **GUI.SetActive**, not by calling **SetActive**.
